entry.title: Abstract 189
Abstract 189b
New World
entry.content:
Mirosław Leśniak

New World RPG scenario



New Beginning


The Earth as we knew it is no more, cataclysms like earthquakes, floods, fires, hurricanes, wars destroyed all the governments and killed most population, most satellites fell into atmosphere and burned. There is a blue orb orbiting the moon at night, no one knows what it is. Some people have powers now that used to be called magic.

You’re a bunch of crazy, young people that don’t know The World Before The End, you travel from town to town on the North USA Black Wasteland ruins looking for jobs, your hometown is Scrap, placed in an old junkyard, leaded and guarded by a master in robotics: Sid. His robots defend the town and provide services in it. You’re:


Trax:

Beginner pyromancer: Can start fire of an object by touching it. Carries a Glock 9mm. In future he’ll be able to throw fireballs or start walls of fire. Very charismatic, handsome guy, leader of the group. Very good speaker. Knows English and Russian.


Senpai:

Gun freak. He might be only twenty two however his hair are gray. He tries to be a master in firearms. Carries a Magnum 44, he has a car and a Remington sniper rifle in the back trunk. Knows the most about guns among the group. OK mechanic.


Zip:

A young thief. Short guy, 165cm tall, always carries a lock picking tools and a robotic rope with a hook which he is very good with, also carries a 9mm Glock in case his agility fails. Climbs and swims well.


Siegfried:

Knife and sword maniac. Carries a katana, throws knives, sometimes cuts his own skin for fun when he’s bored. Very fast runner that can jump far. Practices parkour. Silent killer. Catholic. Black.


They are near to be broke, they have only 24 tix altogether.


Sid (me) sometimes provides help by lending his robots for a fair amount of Tix.


He offers a humanoid, armored, punching humanoid robot fro lend for 20 tix, a small, wheeled scout robot for 20 tix + 20tix if armed with a c4 bomb it can plant or detonate and a track based cargo robot for 20 tix. If a robot wont be returned that’s extra 20 tix penalty.


The main town store offers few 9mm guns, 9mm ammo, gas masks, wound healing injections, antibiotics, military grade food, fuel, noctovision googles, batteries, flares.


One day there is a guest showing up in Scrap looking for people that will get him to the Rubber Forest. Rubber forest is one of the places on this wasteland considered dangerous, some sketchy people go into it for unknown reasons, some people that went there never came back, some came back wounded or robbed, some were fine but everyone says it’s not a good spot.

The guy says his name is Ernie, he’s a long haired 52 years old white man, and he needs an escort to get there and talk to someone, it’s really important but he can’t tell more. He offers 100 tix for the job. This would fix your financial needs for a week or two. He rides a rusty Harley Davidson and carries a shotgun.

Ernie needs to talk to the leader of the Wasteland Devils, a gang controlling that part of The Black Wasteland. He has a serious message. Earnie is an advanced user of telepathy and kinetic forces. He can far see, receive and send messages in mind on medium distances and move medium objects with kinetic powers. However Rubber Forest is way too dangerous to go alone.


Road to Rubber Forest


The road to the Rubber Forest is a day long ride in a car through Black Rock desert. Very little plants grow around here. Team has to get fuel from the Junkyard and pay for it. It’s 0.1 Tix per liter. On their way to the Junkyard they encounter a smoking car wreck on the road. Two burned corpses inside. Seems like a Russian UFO activity, the car looks like destroyed by a laser cannon. They better be careful for the aircrafts around. They also pass by The Black Skull Lake, there is a small woods nearby and the water isn’t contaminated much, some fish still swim, few rabbits wander around the woods, they can be eaten. There are few abandoned boats with broken engines at the shore. They can be repaired and fueled. On the center of the lake they can find a small island with a crashed old helicopter wreck where they can find an abandoned bag containing 43 tix and a SIG Sauer 9mm gun with a full magazine; the gun requires cleaning.

There is a single water mutant sleeping on the island, he’s harmless and frightened on the land, he will try running and splashing into the water when he see them, but, if they manage to give him a fish he will hand them a gold nugget, worthless in this times. Seems the area is gold rich. He’s an excellent swimmer and can drag people to the bottom of the lake in the waters if they decide to swim a bit. All he can say is „Greg”, apparently his name.

Around this time a sudden fog comes. It’s a little toxic, causes coughing. The team will see can see a car approaching with one light working. People who ride it are three armed Wasteland Devils.

Outside their hideout they are hostile, armed robbers. That’s how they supply the Rubber Forest. They all wear read leather jackets and blue jeans. One of them wears kevlar. They might decide to attack the team if they consider they have advantage. If they think otherwise or start loosing combat, they will try escaping back to the Rubber Forest in their car. If they manage to escape they might make more gangsters come and rob the team. The fog will remain till the end of the day and during night.


The Rubber Forest


Basically it’s a large old tire waste disposal. When I mean large I mean gigantic. No one knows where it comes from. When team comes there is still fog around. Wasteland Devils live inside, between piles of rubber. The main entrance where the road ends is being observed with CCTV hidden in piles of rubber. Ernie can sense that with his far seeing. Wasteland Devils know this area very well, people that enter it are constantly watched and tracked. They will attack only if players get into one of their traps, however they will first speak before they attack, they will try to find out who they’re dealing with and what are they up to. The area is large but there is only below thirty people living in it. Lots of crows around. They most likely, eventually will be caught into a trap, disarmed and taken into custody then brought to the center of Rubber Forest. To the boss.


The Wasteland Devil


The place is made of several buildings made of sheet metal built around a camp fire where two women seem cooking a soup. They can here chickens crackling, pigs grunting and few dogs barking. The Devils say "you’ll end up here!” and point at several cages on stakes next to the fire, there is a human locked in one of the cages, seems sleeping. Then they throw them into the cages. It’s early night. Zip is able to open the cage when no one watches him. Trax can convince the women to talk with him. Earnie keeps on saying he wants to talk to the boss and he has a message to the boss. When the other prisoner wakes up it turns out he speak only Russian, Trax is able to talk with him. His name is Vanya, he says he’s a pilot of an aircraft that crashed, he tried getting help here but got into custody, they don’t want to let him out, he’s here for weeks already. He says that the boss is not a human and creeps him out. That brings gloomy mood to the rest of the team. If they talk in cages too much the guards will turn electricity on and the cages will shock them with electricity.

On the morning every Devil gathers before the largest building in town in a row. The boss comes out from the building. He’s a short humanoid with a really big head, moves slowly, his skin is grey, eyes large, fingers long. There are several glowing objects levitating around his large head. He puts a mask on, turns out to be a communication device. Earnie instantly yells: „A13C! Zenith want you back!”. The alien freezes for thirty seconds. Through his communication device he says „let them out but don’t give their equipment back”. Then he quickly gets back to the building of his.


Zenith


The only remaining space station. Tricky place to get in, very little people know how, no one that wasn’t there know what's in it. But every one knows it’s there, that’s large white light moving through the night sky. They say it’s the last hope for humanity but that’s only one of the legends. Apparently A13C and Earnie know more.


Way Further


Tbc…

entry.title: Abstract 195
Backdoors
entry.content: I think people should be more aware about backdoor problem in modern era. I am among hackers for at least 15 years now, we find knowledge about backdoors common. From time to time, trough industry media there are going large and bigger affairs exposing backdoors in often crucial, secure software and hardware components of digital devices. At the same time people rely more and more on the electronic devices and keep crucial information on those devices, unaware of the danger. What’s different than 15 years ago is the scale of the problem. For me it started with the infamous OpenBSD IPSec backdoor. That made me aware backdoors in open source projects happen. That changed my perception. Then large affairs like Heart Bleed or Spectre that exposed „bugs” that were really backdoors implemented by the manufacturers, patched afterwards because the industry pressure. I bet they implemented new backdoors afterwards. It depends who you are and what you do, not that much what software you pick, now day. Microsoft makes different keys for different sectors and countries changing slightly how Windows behaves. Linux and Apple betrays their users. Android is a joke. Everything basically compromised. It seems that paper survived the test of the time.

entry.title: Abstract 199

Nature
entry.content:
I dream about her sometimes
She is long gone
Migrated out to live different life
Among the others
I am old now, seen her eight years ago
There was no need
No need to migrate out
I stayed
So I am here
Alone
Getting older and older
And they just laugh
Laugh because our fate
Victim of politics
Like a gunmetal sculpture
Eventually forgotten
As all dead become
In clash with eternity
Just I can scream
In hope to be heard
But no one that hears
Cares
Just like concrete around me
Or the grave of my father
They just remain
Until they get demolished
And no one cares again
Because the nature of this world

entry.title: Fundraiser
entry.content:
So, the situaion is: five weeks ago I had a mental breakdown and I went to a psychiatric hospital. I'm fine now but they keep me in the hospital because it was one breakdown too many. Now my mom and the docs are giving up on me and they want to put me into a care home. I'm 37. A court will decide whether to place me in a care home or not. This is where I need a lawyer which costs $650. I do not want to go to a care home, it is crossing my plans like doing my art exhibition or going abroad. Plus in such places there is limited freedom, privacy, there is potential thievery, violence, alcohol and drugs. It is no good. I expect a letter from the court in around two-three weeks from now, then I have to hire the lawyer as soon as possible.

So I need your help to raise funds fot that lawyer, if you want to help please donate via PayPal, the donate button is in the bottom of the page.

Thank you

Currently there is $620/$650 raised.
This data is being updated manually.

Update 04/19/2024 Friday
There still was no expert witness psychiarist eximining me nor the letter from the court. I keep on waiting.

Update 04/23/2024 Tuesday
I got a letter from the courrt saying that they're redirecting the process to my home city where I live (the hospital I'm in is placed in another city)

Update 05/18/2024 Saturday
I got information from the court saying that the expert whitness will be assigned to me after 05/29/2024

entry.title: Slimey
entry.content:
Slimey monsters
Annoying maggots
Colorful cloths
Ugly faces
Terrible voices
Vague intentions
In circles
Of self adoration
A kalashnikov
Beauty of its own
Pure truth
Sincere intentions
Effective in work
Just super cool
Every time
Leaves an impression

entry.title: (PL) Tulipany
entry.content:
Pola pełne kolorowych tulipanów
Niezastąpiony zapach kwiatów
Prowadzi niektórych do szaleństwa
Niektórzy nie znają nic poza tym
Goły beton miast
Solidny jak starożytna skała
Przygotowany misternie
Przez mistrzów urbanistyki
Źródła krystalicznej wody
Dla szczególnie kochanych
Przynoszą dużo życia
I wiele pomyślności
Nieba pełne samolotów
Latanie jest dla wybranych
Dla wybranych którzy
Są godni latania

entry.title: Tulips
entry.content:
Fields full of colorful tulips
Irreplaceable scent of flowers
Drives some a bit crazy
Some don’t know what’s beyond
Bare concrete of the cities
Solid like a primal rock
Prepared very carefully
By the urbanist masters
Springs of crystal water
Reserved mailny for those
Who are loved the most
They bring good fortune
Skies full of planes
Flying is for the chosen
For chosen that proved
That they’re worthy flying

entry.title: (PL) Zmiany
entry.content:
Chemikalia w mojej krwi
Zmieniają mnie
Zmieniam się dzień po dniu
Konsekwentnie
Nie wiem jak będę rozmawiał
Z moją matką
Moją siostrą
Bratem
Śmierć przyjdzie i tak
Mogę się nie nie zgadzać
Ile chcę
Nie ma to znaczenia
Na teraz muszę być z boku
W szklarni niechcianych
System jest świetnie przygotowany
Na takich jak ja

entry.title: Changes
entry.content:
Chemicals in my blood
They change me
Day by day I change
Consequently
I don’t know how will I talk
To my mother
My sister
Brother
Death will come regardless
I can disagree
All I want
It does not matter
For now I have to be aside
In a greenhouse of the unwanted
System is well prepared
For such as me

entry.title: (PL) Zero
entry.content:
To dużo, dwadzieścia pięć
Nikt tu jeszcze nie był
Jestem na samym szczycie
Wiem lepiej co jest wyżej
Patrzę na świat jakim jest
Nie widzę żadnych pytań
Mogę śmiało iść na przód
Wiem dobrze, że słońce lśni
Nie potrzebuję pozwolenia
Zawsze znam cenę
Moje miejsce na ziemi tłumaczy
Długi szereg numerów
Potrzebuje ofiary aby być dużym
I Boga aby być certyfikowanym
Każdy wie co jest prawdziwe
Zero wątpliwości na ten temat

entry.title: Zero
entry.content:
It’s a lot, twenty five
No one else been here
I’m on top of it all
I know better what’s above
I see things as they are
No questions left by no one
I can easily go forward
I know well the sun is shining
I don’t need no permission
Always know what’s the price
My place on earth is explained
By long series of numbers
I need a victim to be big
And a God to be certified
Everyone knows what’s real
Zero doubts about it

entry.title: (PL) Feniks
entry.content:
Płonące pióra i iskry
Feniks wstaje z popiołów
Tak pełen silnej energii
Płonąc mocno w swoim rdzeniu
Ciemność jest skończona
Zakończona, zakończona i koniec
Teraz nie martwię się już tyle
Odnajdę drogę dzięki blaskowi
Płonące pióra i iskry
Niewielu w to uwierzy
Położę to obok lśniących koni
I niedźwiedzi z głębokiego lasu
Teraz muszę zapalić papierosa
Wraz z innymi dziećmi kosmosu
Dziećmi kosmosu jak ja
Pomiędzy słońcem, księżycem i planetami

entry.title: Phoenix
entry.content:
Flaming feathers and sparks
The phoenix is rising from ashes
So full of powerful energy
Blazing hot in the core
The darkness is finished
Done and done, it’s over
Now I won’t worry that much
I’ll find my way, due to the shine
Flaming feathers and sparks
Not too many will believe
I put it next to shiny horses
And deep forest bears
Now I need to have a cigarette
Along with other children of cosmos
Children of cosmos like me
Between sun, moon and all the planets

entry.title: (PL) Brud
entry.content:
Siedemnaście tygodni tutaj
Co mogę powiedzieć
Jestem jak pasywny obserwator
Gdzieś daleko
Nasze powietrze jest brudne
Przez kogoś wrogiego
Nie jestem w stanie wskazać
Kto to jest
Kolorowe panele
Grają mistrzostwa Europy
Przynajmniej to wnosi
Trochę radości do naszych żyć
Nie obchodzi nas kto dzisiaj umarł
Mamy swoje upiory
Kawa i papierosy
Sprawiają, że daje to znieść

entry.title: Pollution
entry.content:
Seventeen weeks in this place
What can I say
I’m like a passive observer
At somewhere distant
Our air is polluted
By someone hostile
I am unable to point
Who that is
The colorful panels
Play euro championships
At least this
Brings some fun to our lives
We don’t care who died today
We have daemons of our own
Coffee and cigarettes
Make it bearable

entry.title: (PL) Pstrąg
entry.content:
Płynie, rzeka płynie
Nie trzeba pstrągom mówić gdzie
Po prostu już wiedzą
Gdzie płynąć a gdzie nie
A kiedy księżyc błyszczy
Młode kwiatki idą spać
Śnią o swoich miłościach
Spotykanych co dzień w szkole
Socjalistyczne utopie są w ruinie
Budowane krwią i potem
Z myślą o ludzie
Można je znaleźć pod stertą sklepów
W tym samym czasie
Syriusz lśni jak zwykle
Przypomina nam gdzie jesteśmy
Zawsze kiedy nocne niebo jest czyste

entry.title: Trout
entry.content:
It flows, the river flows
No need to tell the trouts where
They simply already know
Where to go and where not to
And when the moon shines
Young blossoms go to sleep
They dream about their loves
Met in school daily
Socialist utopias are in ruin
Built with blood and sweat
With thought for the people
You can find them under piles of stores
At the same time tho
Sirius shines like always
Reminds us where we are
Every night the sky is clear

entry.title: Abstract 209
(PL) Senny
entry.content:
Senne oczka z rana
Nadal mglisty umysł
Pierwsza kawa już wypita
Kilka dni temu letnie przesilenie
Panele słoneczne zbierają energię
Cicho zasilają budynek
Spędziłem tu całą wiosnę
Wiosenne kwiaty dawno przeminęły
A śmierć zbiera żniwo każdej sekundy
Za zamkniętymi drzwiami
Rzadko ktoś robi to jawnie
Dlatego, że to przeciwko savior-vivre
Każdy zdaje sobie z tego sprawę
Czasami tylko ktoś trochę zapłacze
Samotnie na klatce dużego bloku
Bo wie, że ich życie dobiega końca

entry.title: Sleepy
entry.content:
Sleepy eyes in the morning
Still having foggy mind
First coffee already drank
Summer solstice few days back
Solar panels gather energy
Silently power up the building
I’ve spent whole spring over here
The spring flowers are long gone
And death harvests every second
Behind closed doors, no one sees it
Rarely anyone makes it visible
Because it’s against the savior-vivre
Everyone is aware of it
Sometimes someone only cries a little
Alone on a big block stair case
Because they know their life is over

entry.title: Abstract 209b
(PL) Miecz
entry.content:
Jej miecz wskazuje niebo
Złoty ząb błyszczy
Rakiety lecą
Rakiety na ziemię spadają
Wybucha wojna
Połykam tabletki
Chcę umrzeć
Szpital przywraca mnie do życia
Bezdomne koty
Walczą nocami
Nietrzeźwi ludzie
Przechodzą obok
Jowisz i Saturn
Tańczą nad nami
Otwieram mapę niebios
I jestem tego pewny

entry.title: Sword
entry.content:
Her sword points the sky
Golden tooth shines
Rockets fly
Rockets drop on the ground
A war breaks out
I swallow pills
I want to die
A hospital brings me back
Stray cats
Fight in the night
Drunk people
Want to pass by
Jupiter and Saturn
Dance above us
I open a sky map
And confirm that's right

entry.title: (PL) Rozkład
entry.content:
Czas na kawę wkrótce
To część rozkładu dnia
Wielu ściśle
Punkt ten przestrzega
Ludzie schodzą się
Aby napić się kawy
Nikt nie chce
Tego punktu ominąć
Jest to swojego rodzaju
Rytuał
Rytuał którego wielu
Nie ominie
Otoczony
Małą kulturą
Małą kulturą
Picia kawy

entry.title: Schedule
entry.content:
Coffee time soon
It's part of the schedule
Many strictly execute
This part of the schedule
People gather
To have some coffee
No one wants to
Skip this part of the schedule
It’s sort of
A ritual
A ritual many
Won’t ever skip
It’s surrounded
By a small culture
A culture
Of coffee drinking

entry.title: (PL) Tygrysy
entry.content:
Przeklęty przez stygmaty
Jak trąd
Nękany przez wilki
Stający przeciw tygrysom
Jak w cyrku
Zamknięty w klatce
Bez dużego wyboru
Dla odrobiny rozrywki
Kontakt przez satelity
Jak nowoczesny człowiek
Jakie niewiarygodne
Osiągnięcie
Sprowadza to do
Kolektywnej nienawiści
Która zwykle
Uchodzi na sucho

entry.title: Tigers
entry.content:
Cursed by stigmas
Like leprosy
Followed by wolves
Facing tigers
Like in a circus
Closed in a cage
With not much choice
For some amusement
Contact through satellites
Like modern humans
Such unbelievable
Accomplishment
It all comes down to
Collective hatered
That usually
Just gets away

entry.title: (PL) Upał
entry.content:
Upał sączy się z niebios
Oddychamy gorącym powietrzem
Lato przyszło do nas
Zostanie tutaj trochę
Otwarte baseny ruszyły
Niejeden skorzysta z jezior
Szukając trochę ochłody
Bałtyk jest nadal zimny
Wielu ludzi umrze
Upał bywa zabójczy
Umrą w szpitalach
W szpitalach nieopodal
A ja w jednym ugrzązłem
Mój ma klimatyzację
Ochroni mnie przed upałem
Upałem który przybył do nas

entry.title: Heat
entry.content:
Heat flows from the sky
We breathe hot air
Summer came over to us
Will stay around a little
Outdoor pools opened
Many go to lakes as well
Looking for some chill
The Baltic Sea is still cold
A lot people will die
The heat is lethal to some
They die in hospitals
In the hospitals nearby
And I am stuck in one
Mine is air conditioned
Will save me from heat
The heat that came upon us

entry.title: (PL) Zefir
entry.content:
Czas ucieka
Klepsydry piach przesypują
Dzień po dniu
Jest go coraz mniej
Musimy wyplenić chwasty
Zebrać plony
Kiedy jastrzębie polują
A myszy się chowają
Słońce mocno pali
Jest tak niewiele cienia
Każdy powiew zefira
Jest jak błogosławieństwo
A jednego popołudnia
Kiedy zabrzmi dzwoń
Ostatni przyjdzie gość
I zabierze nas ze sobą

entry.title: Zephyr
entry.content:
Time is running out
Hourglasses pour sand
Day after day
There is less of it
We need to peel the weeds
Collect the crops
While the hawks hunt
And the mice hide
The Sun burns a lot
So little shade to cover
Every blow of zephyr
Is a little blessing
And one afternoon
Right when the bell rings
The last visitor comes
And takes us away
